name: Golden potatoes
description:
Wow, you moved into a beautiful new house and there's so much rooms! Wait, hold up... Did the previous owner leave something behind? A golden nugget? No a golden potato. Wait there's more potatoes around the house! I got get 'em all!

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

-BTW-

The UI when you finish the game might be off a little. But it's still readable.
